segments.text: Were you late for work this morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I was . I was almost an hour late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you say to your boss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I said I was terribly sorry . But he said it was quite all right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he didn't scold me because he was late , too .
segments.speaker: S2
